title: [EPIC] Web App E2E Reliability (aragora.ai)
body:
Owner: @team-growth
KPI: Login-to-debate success >= 98%, critical frontend error rate <= 0.2%.

Scope:
- Eliminate loading hangs and fatal runtime crashes in auth and debate entry paths.
- Ensure OAuth new-user registration and post-login redirects are deterministic.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] E2E auth + onboarding + debate-start flow passes in CI.
- [ ] OAuth callback creates or links user/org correctly for new users.
- [ ] Post-login redirect consistently lands on intended debate destination.

title: Fix OAuth callback auto-registration and account linking
body:
Owner: @team-platform
KPI: OAuth callback failure rate <= 1%.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] New OAuth user bootstrap path creates expected profile/org linkage.
- [ ] Existing user link path is idempotent.
- [ ] Auth callback telemetry includes failure taxonomy and correlation IDs.

title: Fix post-login redirect regressions into debate flows
body:
Owner: @team-growth
KPI: Redirect correctness >= 99%.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Redirect allowlist and target resolution tested for standard and OAuth login.
- [ ] Debate deep-link redirect retains state and intended route.
- [ ] Error fallback route is explicit and user-recoverable.

title: Add frontend crash telemetry gate for React runtime failures
body:
Owner: @team-growth
KPI: Critical runtime crash alerts < 1/day.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Client runtime errors reported with route + release SHA.
- [ ] CI smoke test fails on known fatal error signatures.
- [ ] Dashboard tracks top crash signatures and trend.

title: [EPIC] Oracle Real-Time Streaming + TTS
body:
Owner: @team-core
KPI: Time-to-first-token <= 1.5s, time-to-first-audio <= 2.0s.

Scope:
- Move Oracle from batch completion mode to live token streaming with synchronized TTS.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Oracle emits token stream events in real time.
- [ ] TTS playback starts while generation is still in progress.
- [ ] Feature flag + rollback path included.

title: Implement Oracle token streaming endpoint and client transport
body:
Owner: @team-core
KPI: Oracle TTFT <= 1.5s p95.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Stream endpoint supports resume/reconnect semantics.
- [ ] Client subscription and buffering are robust on network jitter.
- [ ] Integration tests cover normal, reconnect, and timeout paths.

title: Integrate live TTS playback with streaming token output
body:
Owner: @team-growth
KPI: Time-to-first-audio <= 2.0s p95.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Audio chunks begin before full text completion.
- [ ] User can pause/stop/resume voice playback.
- [ ] Fallback to text-only mode when TTS fails.

title: [EPIC] Autonomous Self-Improvement (Self-Directed Goals)
body:
Owner: @team-core
KPI: >= 60% of accepted improvement cycles are system-proposed.

Scope:
- System discovers and prioritizes its own next tasks from telemetry and quality signals.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Goal proposal engine ranks opportunities with confidence and expected impact.
- [ ] Policy gate approves/rejects autonomous proposals before execution.
- [ ] Receipts/audit logs capture autonomous goal provenance.

title: Build autonomous goal proposal/ranking pipeline
body:
Owner: @team-core
KPI: Proposal precision >= 70% (human acceptance proxy).

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Inputs include CI failures, usage telemetry, and capability gaps.
- [ ] Ranked backlog output includes rationale and estimated effort.
- [ ] Feedback loop updates ranking quality over time.

title: [EPIC] Ideas-to-Execution Visual DAG
body:
Owner: @team-growth
KPI: Median idea-to-first-executed-task <= 20 minutes.

Scope:
- Visual graph from ideas -> goals/principles -> tasks -> agent execution -> feedback.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] DAG editor supports node typing, dependency links, and execution state.
- [ ] Graph can dispatch tasks to agents/workflows/OpenClaw execution paths.
- [ ] Execution status streams back to UI in real time.

title: Ship DAG backend schema and orchestration bridge
body:
Owner: @team-core
KPI: 80% DAG nodes become executable tasks.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Node schema supports idea, goal, principle, task, checkpoint, dependency.
- [ ] Workflow engine accepts DAG-derived plans.
- [ ] Persistence supports resume/replay after restarts.

title: Ship DAG UI with live execution overlays
body:
Owner: @team-growth
KPI: DAG execution visibility satisfaction >= 80% in pilot feedback.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Node status updates stream live (queued/running/success/fail/blocked).
- [ ] Users can intervene on nodes and reroute dependencies.
- [ ] UI supports filtering by owner, status, and critical path.

title: [EPIC] Differentiate Against Single-Agent Workflows
body:
Owner: @team-analytics
KPI: >= 90% decisions have adversarial-vetting artifacts and trust calibration traces.

Scope:
- Make differentiation explicit and measurable in product and receipts.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Receipt template highlights thesis/antithesis/synthesis and dissent.
- [ ] Memory and calibration impact visible in decision summaries.
- [ ] Comparison dashboard quantifies single-agent vs multi-agent outcomes.

title: [EPIC] Surface Stranded Features
body:
Owner: @team-growth
KPI: Activation of top 20 dormant features doubles.

Scope:
- Integrate existing backend capabilities into discoverable UI flows.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Feature discovery map linked to actionable UI entry points.
- [ ] Progressive disclosure prevents overwhelming new users.
- [ ] Feature usage telemetry added per surfaced module.

title: Create feature-to-UI mapping from capability matrix
body:
Owner: @team-platform
KPI: UI coverage 14.3% -> >= 35%.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Every mapped capability has owner and surface plan.
- [ ] Missing UI list in capability matrix is tracked as issues.
- [ ] Weekly regeneration published in status artifacts.

title: [EPIC] Production Deployment Reliability
body:
Owner: @team-sre
KPI: Deploy success >= 99%, MTTR <= 15 minutes.

Scope:
- Eliminate dead-server drift and stale frontend deploys.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Deploy pipelines verify live SHA matches expected commit.
- [ ] Auto-rollback triggers on post-deploy health failure.
- [ ] Frontend deploy freshness validation prevents stale edge artifacts.

title: Add deploy SHA verification and freshness checks
body:
Owner: @team-sre
KPI: Drift between expected and live SHA = 0.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Backend and frontend deployments publish runtime build SHA.
- [ ] CI blocks success if production endpoints report mismatched SHA.
- [ ] Cloudflare edge cache invalidation is validated post-release.

title: [EPIC] Frontend Coverage for Backend Features
body:
Owner: @team-growth
KPI: >= 70% top backend domains have first-party UI pages.

Scope:
- Build frontend pages for intelligence dashboard, pipeline canvas, knowledge flow, and agent performance surfaces.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Page routes exist with auth/RBAC guards.
- [ ] API contracts are versioned and typed in frontend.
- [ ] Smoke tests cover core navigation and rendering.

title: Ship intelligence dashboard UI backed by existing analytics endpoints
body:
Owner: @team-growth
KPI: Dashboard weekly active usage >= 60% in pilot orgs.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Agent performance, debate outcomes, and calibration panels available.
- [ ] Time-range and workspace filters supported.
- [ ] Export and deep-link actions implemented.

title: [EPIC] Multi-Agent Worktree Coordination
body:
Owner: @team-core
KPI: Parallel session efficiency >= 60% (from ~15-20%).

Scope:
- Isolated worktrees, hierarchy-based assignment, stalled-process recovery, and safe git reconciliation.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Worktree isolation is default in autonomous modes.
- [ ] Coordinator restarts stalled branches and reports cause.
- [ ] Merge/reconciliation path includes test gate and conflict strategy.

title: Enable hierarchical branch coordinator by default with health watchdog
body:
Owner: @team-core
KPI: Stalled-session recovery success >= 90%.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Branch coordinator path enabled for autonomous execution by default.
- [ ] Watchdog detects and retries stalled sessions.
- [ ] Recovery events are auditable and visible in dashboard.

title: Add git reconciliation policy for multi-worktree parallelism
body:
Owner: @team-platform
KPI: Merge conflict abort rate <= 10%.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Reconciliation supports merge, rebase, and rollback policies.
- [ ] Conflicts are classified and routed with remediation hints.
- [ ] Pre-merge test gate runs per worktree branch.

title: [EPIC] Debate Experience: Live Reasoning + Human Intervention
body:
Owner: @team-growth
KPI: Time-to-first-token <= 1.0s; intervention success >= 98%.

Scope:
- Make debates visibly live with token flow, reasoning steps, and intervention controls.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Debate UI shows per-agent live reasoning/progress states.
- [ ] Intervention controls (pause, nudge, challenge, inject evidence) work reliably.
- [ ] Replay and timeline views align with stream events.

title: [EPIC] Model Lineup Refresh and Drift Management
body:
Owner: @team-sdk
KPI: Provider compatibility pass rate 100% on current lineup.

Scope:
- Update default model configs to latest supported lineup and enforce mapping parity.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Agent registry + settings defaults updated for target models/providers.
- [ ] OpenRouter mapping and fallback behavior revalidated.
- [ ] Contract tests guard against unsupported model drift.

title: Refresh AGENTS model defaults and provider mappings
body:
Owner: @team-sdk
KPI: 0 stale default model references in runtime and docs.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Runtime defaults and docs point to aligned model IDs.
- [ ] Provider-specific rate limits are validated for refreshed lineup.
- [ ] Backward-compatibility policy documented for deprecated model IDs.

title: [EPIC] Security Hardening Automation
body:
Owner: @team-risk
KPI: 100% production secrets rotated on policy; HIGH/CRITICAL findings = 0.

Scope:
- Fully automate secrets rotation workflows with auditability and SSRF coverage guarantees.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] AWS Secrets Manager rotation jobs have monitored runbooks and rollback.
- [ ] Rotation telemetry and evidence are exported for compliance.
- [ ] SSRF guard usage is verified across outbound URL fetch points.

title: Automate Secrets Manager rotation pipeline with audit evidence
body:
Owner: @team-risk
KPI: 100% secrets rotated within policy windows.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Scheduled rotation jobs cover all production secret classes.
- [ ] Rotation failures trigger alerts and auto-create incident items.
- [ ] Post-rotation health checks validate dependent services.

title: Add SSRF coverage audit for all outbound URL execution points
body:
Owner: @team-risk
KPI: SSRF validation coverage = 100%.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Static/runtime audit identifies outbound URL call sites.
- [ ] All call sites enforce centralized SSRF validation.
- [ ] CI gate fails on newly introduced unguarded call sites.
